query:
SELECT id, slug, author_id, title, content, view, created_at, updated_at
            FROM posts
            WHERE (
                $1::text IS NULL OR
                (title LIKE '%' || $1 || '%' ) OR
                (content LIKE '%' || $1 || '%' )
            ) AND (
                cardinality($2::text[]) = 0 OR
                EXISTS (
                    SELECT 1
                    FROM tags
                    WHERE id IN (
                        SELECT tag_id 
                        FROM post_tags 
                        WHERE post_id = posts.id
                    )
                    AND name = ANY($2)
                )
            ) AND (
                $3::text IS NULL OR
                author_id = (SELECT id FROM accounts WHERE username = $3)
            )
            ORDER BY created_at ASC
            LIMIT $4
            OFFSET $5
